api/BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations.title: Enum MpvEofReason | BassBoom Basolia API - Aptivi
api/BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations.summary: Enum MpvEofReason MPV end of file reasons Namespace: BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations Assembly: BassBoom.Native.dll Syntax public enum MpvEofReason Fields Name Description MPV_END_FILE_REASON_EOF Indicates that we have reached the end of stream. MPV_END_FILE_REASON_ERROR Indicates that the playback has stopped due to an error. MPV_END_FILE_REASON_QUIT Indicates that the playback has stopped by exiting the player. MPV_END_FILE_REASON_REDIRECT Indicates that the playback has been redirected to a new file. MPV_END_FILE_REASON_STOP Indicates that the playback has stopped by an external action.

api/BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations.title: Enum MpvError | BassBoom Basolia API - Aptivi
api/BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations.summary: Enum MpvError MPV error codes Namespace: BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations Assembly: BassBoom.Native.dll Syntax public enum MpvError Fields Name Description MPV_ERROR_AO_INIT_FAILED Indicates that the audio output has failed. MPV_ERROR_COMMAND Indicates that the command can't be run due to some error. MPV_ERROR_EVENT_QUEUE_FULL Indicates that the event ringbuffer is full and that Basolia can't process any more events. MPV_ERROR_GENERIC Indicates that the MPV library has raised some unknown error. MPV_ERROR_INVALID_PARAMETER Indicates that the parameter is invalid or the operation failed for some reason. MPV_ERROR_LOADING_FAILED Indicates that loading has failed (usually used with mpv_event_end_file.error). MPV_ERROR_NOMEM Indicates that the memory allocation has failed. MPV_ERROR_NOTHING_TO_PLAY Indicates that there are no more streams to play. MPV_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED Indicates that the native API function wasn't implemented yet. MPV_ERROR_OPTION_ERROR Indicates that the client is trying to set an option using the invalid option value. MPV_ERROR_OPTION_FORMAT Indicates that the client is trying to set an option using the unsupported MPV format. MPV_ERROR_OPTION_NOT_FOUND Indicates that the option is invalid. MPV_ERROR_PROPERTY_ERROR Indicates that the property can't be get or set. MPV_ERROR_PROPERTY_FORMAT Indicates that the client is trying to set a property using the unsupported MPV format. MPV_ERROR_PROPERTY_NOT_FOUND Indicates that the property is invalid. MPV_ERROR_PROPERTY_UNAVAILABLE Indicates that the property is unavailable at this time. MPV_ERROR_SUCCESS Indicates that the operation is successful. This can be either zero or greater than zero. MPV_ERROR_UNINITIALIZED Indicates that the MPV core wasn't initialized yet. Please call BassBoom.Native.Interop.Init.NativeInit.mpv_create MPV_ERROR_UNKNOWN_FORMAT Indicates that the audio/video format is unrecognized (probably due to corrupt file). MPV_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED Indicates that the system requirements for performing this operation have not been met. MPV_ERROR_VO_INIT_FAILED Indicates that the video output has failed.

api/BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations.title: Enum MpvEventId | BassBoom Basolia API - Aptivi
api/BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations.summary: Enum MpvEventId MPV event ID list Namespace: BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations Assembly: BassBoom.Native.dll Syntax public enum MpvEventId Fields Name Description MPV_EVENT_AUDIO_RECONFIG Audio reconfiguration event MPV_EVENT_CLIENT_MESSAGE script-message input command event MPV_EVENT_COMMAND_REPLY Response to calls to command requests (async) MPV_EVENT_END_FILE End of a file after playback event MPV_EVENT_FILE_LOADED File loaded and decoding starts event MPV_EVENT_GET_PROPERTY_REPLY Response to calls to property get requests (async) MPV_EVENT_HOOK Event hook response event MPV_EVENT_IDLE [Generally not needed] Idle event MPV_EVENT_LOG_MESSAGE Log message event MPV_EVENT_NONE Empty event MPV_EVENT_PLAYBACK_RESTART Playback seek finished (playback restart) event MPV_EVENT_PROPERTY_CHANGE Observed property changed event MPV_EVENT_QUEUE_OVERFLOW Event queue overflow event MPV_EVENT_SEEK Playback seek (temporary stop) event MPV_EVENT_SET_PROPERTY_REPLY Response to calls to property set requests (async) MPV_EVENT_SHUTDOWN The player is shutting down and user code should clean up and use BassBoom.Native.Interop.Init.NativeInit.mpv_destroy or BassBoom.Native.Interop.Init.NativeInit.mpv_terminate_destroy delegate wrappers found in Basolia. MPV_EVENT_START_FILE Start of a file before playback event MPV_EVENT_TICK [Generally not needed] Tick event MPV_EVENT_VIDEO_RECONFIG Video reconfiguration event

api/BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations.title: Enum MpvLogLevel | BassBoom Basolia API - Aptivi
api/BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations.summary: Enum MpvLogLevel MPV log level Namespace: BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations Assembly: BassBoom.Native.dll Syntax public enum MpvLogLevel Fields Name Description MPV_LOG_LEVEL_DEBUG Debug messages MPV_LOG_LEVEL_ERROR Continuable errors MPV_LOG_LEVEL_FATAL Fatal errors MPV_LOG_LEVEL_INFO Informational messages MPV_LOG_LEVEL_NONE No logging MPV_LOG_LEVEL_TRACE Deeper debug messages MPV_LOG_LEVEL_V Verbose messages MPV_LOG_LEVEL_WARN Warning messages

api/BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations.title: Enum MpvRenderFrameInfoFlag | BassBoom Basolia API - Aptivi
api/BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations.summary: Enum MpvRenderFrameInfoFlag MPV render frame info flag Namespace: BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations Assembly: BassBoom.Native.dll Syntax public enum MpvRenderFrameInfoFlag Fields Name Description MPV_RENDER_FRAME_INFO_BLOCK_VSYNC Flag that checks to see if the player timing code expects that the user thread blocks on vertical sync, and that implies that MPV_RENDER_FRAME_INFO_PRESENT is set. MPV_RENDER_FRAME_INFO_PRESENT Flag that checks to see if there is a next frame or not. MPV_RENDER_FRAME_INFO_REDRAW Flag that checks to see if there is a redraw request for the current frame or not. MPV_RENDER_FRAME_INFO_REPEAT Flag that checks to see if there is a reproduction request for the previous frame or not, and that implies that MPV_RENDER_FRAME_INFO_PRESENT is set.

api/BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations.title: Enum MpvRenderParamType | BassBoom Basolia API - Aptivi
api/BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations.summary: Enum MpvRenderParamType MPV render parameter types Namespace: BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations Assembly: BassBoom.Native.dll Syntax public enum MpvRenderParamType Fields Name Description MPV_RENDER_PARAM_ADVANCED_CONTROL Advanced control flag (0 is false, 1 is true) MPV_RENDER_PARAM_AMBIENT_LIGHT Ambient light in lux (int) MPV_RENDER_PARAM_API_TYPE Defines the render API to use (string ("opengl", "sw")) MPV_RENDER_PARAM_BLOCK_FOR_TARGET_TIME Video timing flag (0 is false, 1 is true) MPV_RENDER_PARAM_DEPTH Control surface depth in bits per channel (int, 0 means 8 bits, non-zero number means selected choice) MPV_RENDER_PARAM_DRM_DISPLAY OpenGL DRM display (mpv_opengl_drm_params*, deprecated) MPV_RENDER_PARAM_DRM_DISPLAY_V2 OpenGL DRM display (mpv_opengl_drm_params_v2*) MPV_RENDER_PARAM_DRM_DRAW_SURFACE_SIZE OpenGL DRM draw surface size (mpv_opengl_drm_draw_surface_size*) MPV_RENDER_PARAM_DRM_OSD_SIZE OpenGL DRM draw surface size (mpv_opengl_drm_draw_surface_size*) MPV_RENDER_PARAM_FLIP_Y Flip the Y coordinates (int, 0 means don't flip Y, non-zero number means flip Y) MPV_RENDER_PARAM_ICC_PROFILE ICC profile blob (mpv_byte_array struct passed as System.IntPtr in C#) MPV_RENDER_PARAM_INVALID Not a valid value (always 0). MPV_RENDER_PARAM_NEXT_FRAME_INFO Next frame information to render (mpv_render_frame_info*) MPV_RENDER_PARAM_OPENGL_FBO OpenGL FBO render target (mpv_opengl_fbo struct passed as System.IntPtr in C#) MPV_RENDER_PARAM_OPENGL_INIT_PARAMS OpenGL initialization parameters (mpv_opengl_init_params struct passed as System.IntPtr in C#) MPV_RENDER_PARAM_SKIP_RENDERING Skip rendering flag (0 is false, 1 is true) MPV_RENDER_PARAM_SW_FORMAT Target surface pixel format for rendering using the software renderer (string ("rgb0", "bgr0", "0bgr", "0rgb", "rgb24", or any other format)) MPV_RENDER_PARAM_SW_POINTER Target surface pixel data pointer for rendering using the software renderer (void* passed as System.IntPtr in C#) MPV_RENDER_PARAM_SW_SIZE Target surface size for rendering using the software renderer (int[2]) MPV_RENDER_PARAM_SW_STRIDE Target surface bytes per line for rendering using the software renderer (int) MPV_RENDER_PARAM_WL_DISPLAY Wayland Display (wl_display*) MPV_RENDER_PARAM_X11_DISPLAY X11 Display (Display*)

api/BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations.title: Enum MpvRenderUpdateFlag | BassBoom Basolia API - Aptivi
api/BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations.summary: Enum MpvRenderUpdateFlag MPV render update flag Namespace: BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations Assembly: BassBoom.Native.dll Syntax public enum MpvRenderUpdateFlag Fields Name Description MPV_RENDER_UPDATE_FRAME A new video frame must be rendered.

api/BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations.title: Enum MpvValueFormat | BassBoom Basolia API - Aptivi
api/BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations.summary: Enum MpvValueFormat MPV value formatting options Namespace: BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations Assembly: BassBoom.Native.dll Syntax public enum MpvValueFormat Fields Name Description MPV_FORMAT_BYTE_ARRAY Raw byte array (used within node type, byte[] in C#) MPV_FORMAT_DOUBLE Double-precision floating point number type (double in C, double in C#) MPV_FORMAT_FLAG Boolean type (0 is false, 1 is true) MPV_FORMAT_INT64 64-bit integer type (int64_t in C, long in C#) MPV_FORMAT_NODE MPV node type MPV_FORMAT_NODE_ARRAY MPV node array type (used within node type) MPV_FORMAT_NODE_MAP MPV node array type (used within node type) MPV_FORMAT_NONE No format, usually 0. MPV_FORMAT_OSD_STRING Human-readable string type (const char* in C, System.IntPtr converted to string in C#) MPV_FORMAT_STRING String type (const char* in C, System.IntPtr converted to string in C#)

api/BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations.title: Namespace BassBoom.Native.Interop.Enumerations | BassBoom Basolia API - Aptivi

index.html.title: | BassBoom Basolia API - Aptivi
index.html.summary: What is this web page? This webpage is an API documentation for developers to be used as reference. It constantly gets updated as we push new versions and new APIs, as well as updated documentation. If your IDE supports Intellisense, you don't need to open this web page. If you still intend to use a documentation specific to your preferred version, you may refer to the releases page of the project and download the attached <version>-doc.zip file. To get started using the documentation, select API Documentation from the top menu and select a namespace to get a clear overview of the API. Feedback If you wish to leave feedback to us about this API reference website, use the issue tracker of the project. If you wish to contribute to the documentation of the API, go to the project source code and make your improvements there on a draft Pull Request; we don't support override files that are made by clicking on Improve this doc. Any meaningful contributions are welcome, as long as they follow the code on conduct and contribution guidelines.
